mapper.select:
SELECT TIAR.id, TIAR.valid, TIAR.cityName, TIAR.code, TIAR.continentName, TIAR.countyName, TIAR.createDate, TIAR.districtId AS district_id, TIAR.en, TIAR.enName, TIAR.lastUpdateDate, TIAR.latitude, TIAR.longitude, TIAR.modifyAble, TIAR.name, TIAR.nationName, TIAR.provinceName, TIAR.remark, TIAR.telecomOperatorId AS telecomOperator_id, TIAR.version FROM BD_IPADDRESS_REPOSITYTIAR WHERE
AND TIAR.ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BD_IPADDRESS_REPOSITY ( id, valid, cityName, code, continentName, countyName, createDate, districtId, en, enName, lastUpdateDate, latitude, longitude, modifyAble, name, nationName, provinceName, remark, telecomOperatorId, version ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{valid}, #{cityName}, #{code}, #{continentName}, #{countyName}, #{createDate}, #{district.id}, #{en}, #{enName}, #{lastUpdateDate}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, #{modifyAble}, #{name}, #{nationName}, #{provinceName}, #{remark}, #{telecomOperator.id}, #{version} )
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM BD_IPADDRESS_REPOSITY WHERE
AND id = #{id}
mapper.update:
UPDATE BD_IPADDRESS_REPOSITY
valid = #{valid,javaType=boolean},
cityName = #{cityName,javaType=java.lang.String},
code = #{code,javaType=java.lang.String},
continentName = #{continentName,javaType=java.lang.String},
countyName = #{countyName,javaType=java.lang.String},
createDate = #{createDate,javaType=java.util.Date},
districtId = #{district.id,javaType=java.lang.String},
en = #{en,javaType=java.lang.String},
enName = #{enName,javaType=java.lang.String},
lastUpdateDate = #{lastUpdateDate,javaType=java.util.Date},
latitude = #{latitude,javaType=java.math.BigDecimal},
longitude = #{longitude,javaType=java.math.BigDecimal},
modifyAble = #{modifyAble,javaType=boolean},
name = #{name,javaType=java.lang.String},
nationName = #{nationName,javaType=java.lang.String},
provinceName = #{provinceName,javaType=java.lang.String},
remark = #{remark,javaType=java.lang.String},
telecomOperatorId = #{telecomOperator.id,javaType=java.lang.String},
version = #{version,javaType=java.lang.String},
WHERE id = #{id}
